main.invailid_permission_bot: Invalid permissions. I need the **${permission}** permission!
main.invailid_permission_user: Invalid permissions. You don't have the **${permission}** permission!

error.already_active: Clip Manager is already active and set up
error.reset:
Are you sure you want to reset the bot? **WARNING** All access will be removed and the bot must be re-set with **${prefix}setup ${channelid}**!
 Reply within **10** Seconds with **Confirm-reset**. Otherwise this will be undone automatically.
error.action_success: You have removed all access. If you want to use Clip Manager again, type
error.channelnotexist: **Channel** does not exist. Please enter a valid channel id!

reset.setAuthor: Clip Manager has been successfully set up
reset.setDescription: Clip Manager has been successfully set up. Below you can see the webpanel url and which channel has been set.

help.command_setup_reset: Reset all access including the clip channel id.

error.already_registered: You are already registered in this guild!
error.wrong_guild: Please activate this key in the selected guild!
error.key_not_exist: This key is invalid or has already been activated. If you believe this is a mistake, contact your server administrator.

key.success: Your key `${key}` has been successfully activated! You can now log in to https://dashboard.clipmanager.net/. Questions? https://clipmanager.net/discord

error.clipsonly: Only the clips from **${twitchuser}** can be placed here!
error.cantfindclip: Something went wrong. I cannot find that clip.
error.alreadyposted: Something went wrong. This clip has already been posted.
error.canttalk: Unfortunately, you are not allowed to speak in here. This channel <#${channel}> is only for Twitch clips.
error.wrongurl: Something went wrong with your link. Does your link match the example?

client_message.updatechannel: There are currently ${result.length} ${getclipname} submitted! | You can only post 1 clip per message!
